Header: Joint Opposition cuts birthday cake on SLFP anniversary day
Content: Today marks the 65 th anniversary of Sri Lanka Freedom Party. The party was formed by former president the late S.W.R.D. Bandaranaike on September 2, 1951 during a meeting held at the Colombo Town Hall. Later, the first SLFP government was voted into power in 1956.
